title: Zombie Bashing Rejects (So it Begins
description: Marie Blake's day couldn't get any worst. She not only gets shackled against her school's locker, she also gets slapped, forced to miss her date with Jeremy Walker, (one of the schools most eye catching candy). To top it all off, she manages to escape to the start of the "Zombie Apocalypse‚Äù. Darien, Stacy, and Nickolas, had planned their day around tormenting Marie Blake. They wanted to humiliate, for being the schools most desired possession. Things don't work out as they planned, since Marie Blake wasn't the pushover bimbo they thought she was. No, she turned out to be a hardcore bitch instead. Now, forced to survive the outbreak togethers, things get heated up. Join, these group of rejects as they survive Zombies, and each other.
author: Lucille Wiekel
